hf.action: XR-7 discovers a hidden entrance to an underground shelter, curiosity evident in its glowing eyes.

qa.action: XR-7 wanders through misty, overgrown city streets, suddenly alert as it detects underground tremors.

hf.action: XR-7 discovers a hidden entrance to an underground shelter, rushing in as it senses danger.

tr.action: XR-7 enters a vast underground cavern, witnessing a community of human survivors in panic as the tunnel begins to collapse.

xc.action: Dr. Eliza Chen looks at XR-7 with desperate hope as she tries to protect Marcus from falling debris.
